price: وە دەڵێن ئەگەر خوا بیوویستایە ئێمە ئەو (فریشتانەمان) نەدەپەرست ھیچ زانیاریەکیان نیە لەو بارەیەوە ئەوانە ھەردرۆ دەکەن
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡ شَآءَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ مَا عَبَدۡنَٰهُمۗ مَّا لَهُم بِذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ عِلۡمٍۖ إِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَخۡرُصُونَ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqālū law shāa al-raḥmānu mā ʿabadnāhum mā lahum bidhālika min ʿil'min in hum illā yakhruṣūna
translations: we would not have worshipped them
we would not have worshipped them
